attributes.title: Re-Establish Yourself In Advaita || Part 3 || Nithya Satsang || 05 May 2014
attributes.description:
Name Of The Program : Nithya Satsang Part 3
Session on: Living Advaita Teamily Process
Date : 05 May 2014
Venue : Varanasi, India

In this video Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism HDH #Nithyananda Paramashivam expands on Living Advaita Teamily Process where Swamiji explains the technique to experience the "Non-Duality" space with whom we share our #life and with people we work, defining it as TEAMILY(Team+Family).The technique leads one to cause their reality in life by #Advaita.

More on Living Advaita Process(Playlist) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HQ4_SEfEn00&list=PL21WI5_pNwj4NzrA0KEyTrD7LC5T9sQ4j
